page.title: 01Farmland West of Huntingdon
page.content: This block is bounded in the north by farmland & on the east side by farm- land & a small part of the village of Brampton. More farmland to the south but also Brampton Wood designated as a conservation Area. In the west, part of the village of Ellington and the tiny hamlet of Ellington Thorpe. Two way busy roads run through the block, the A604 east to Kettering & west to Cambridge & the A1, the main trunk road from London to the north east of England. In spite of its isolation & lack of shools, Doctor & Dentist, the population of Ellington has doubled in the last 10 yrs. Virtually all the working population commutes by car, some going as far afield as London, Cambridge & Peterborough. Every effort however, has been made to maintain & foster the identity of the village as a caring community.
